tool_description: Optimizes delivery routes for packages based on destination addresses, traffic patterns, delivery constraints, and driver schedules.

delivery_addresses.description: List of delivery addresses to optimize

tracking_numbers.description: Corresponding tracking numbers for each address

time_windows.description: Delivery time windows for each address (HH:MM-HH:MM format)

consider_traffic.description: Whether to consider real-time traffic data

error_messages: Address count mismatch: delivery_addresses and tracking_numbers arrays must have the same length.
Invalid address: One or more addresses cannot be geocoded.
Too many addresses: Maximum 100 addresses per optimization request.
Invalid time window format: Use HH:MM-HH:MM format for time windows.
Infeasible route: Cannot create a feasible route with given constraints.
Invalid delivery date: Delivery date must be in the future.
usage: Provide delivery_addresses and tracking_numbers arrays, depot_location, and delivery_date. Optionally specify time_windows, vehicle_capacity, max_route_time, and traffic consideration preferences.

optimized_route.description: Ordered list of addresses in optimal delivery sequence

route_tracking_numbers.description: Tracking numbers in optimized delivery order

estimated_total_time.description: Total estimated route time in minutes

delivery_schedule.description: Estimated arrival times for each stop
